ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:9}); // “(Hey, who do you think you are?)”{PAUSE}“Professor Hojo.
That scary man says
he wants to talk with you.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:10}); // “(What's his problem?)”{PAUSE}“Yes, that's right.
It's the Professor!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:11}); // “Professor…
someone's here to see you, sir.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // {Cloud}
“Is that man over there, Hojo?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // {Cloud}
“I'll go anywhere Sephiroth is at!”{PAUSE}“To beat him and put an end to all this!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:51}); // {Cloud}
“It's no use.
It's no go.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:12}); // {Aeris}
“I have a bad feeling about this.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:32}); // {Aeris}
“{Cloud}, don't.
If he dies, we won't find out anything!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:39}); // {Aeris}
“I'm {Aeris}.
The least you can do is
remember my name.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:40}); // {Aeris}
“I want you to tell me something,
Professor Hojo…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:41}); // {Aeris}
“I know I'm an Ancient.
My mother told me.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:43}); // {Aeris}
“You didn't know!?
She died.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:45}); // {Aeris}
“Professor Hojo?”{PAUSE}“Is Jenova an Ancient?
Is Sephiroth an Ancient?
Do we all have the same blood?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:48}); // {Aeris}
“He's mumbling slowly…
That must mean he's hiding something!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // {Tifa}
“Go over and talk to him.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:33}); // {Tifa}
“Stop, {Cloud}!
I know how you feel, but you mustn't.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // {Tifa}
“Go over and talk to him.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // {Tifa}
“What're you looking at?”{PAUSE}“That man over there. That's Hojo from Shinra.
Get outta here
Go talk to him!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:36}); // {Yuffie}
“Knock it off, {Cloud}!
Look I don't know,
but he knows a lot of stuff, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:13}); // Hojo
“I'm busy right now.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:15}); // Hojo
“No,
I remember you all now…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:17}); // Hojo
“Yes, yes. I remember now.”{PAUSE}“It's been a long time, {Cloud}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:19}); // Hojo
“Sometimes you just gotta do
something like this.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:21}); // Hojo
“It should be obvious,
I'm getting a tan.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:23}); // Hojo
“Hmm!
I believe we're both after the same goal.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:25}); // Hojo
“Did you see him?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:28}); // Hojo
“Nothing. I just remembered
a certain hypothesis…”{PAUSE}“Haven't you ever had the feeling
something is calling you?”{PAUSE}“Or that you had to visit
some place?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:30}); // Hojo
“I see…
This could be interesting.”{PAUSE}“Were you in SOLDIER? Heh heh heh!
Would you like to be my guinea pig?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:31}); // Hojo
“Oh, now what?
Are you going to draw your sword?”
climbLadder({x:274, y:201, z:0, triangleId:155, advanceKey:Key.Down, animationId:1, facingDirection:224, speed:1});

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:38}); // Hojo
“Say,
aren't you the 'Ancient'? ”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:42}); // Hojo
“Your mother?
Oh, you mean Ifalna.
How is she?”
climbLadder({x:337, y:351, z:8, triangleId:349, advanceKey:Key.Up, animationId:1, facingDirection:96, speed:1});

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:85}); // “It's getting closer and closer.
Someone will do something, don't you think?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:77}); // “If this is your idea of flirting…forget it.
I do fine as it is.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:58}); // “That's right!!
It totally skipped my mind!”{PAUSE}“There was something
I was supposed to tell you.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:59}); // “That's right!
It's about that!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:60}); // “It was yesterday.
A man wearing a black cape
came up from the ocean.”{PAUSE}“I think he had tickets for the Gold Saucer…
no, that wasn't it…
I wonder if it was all just an illusion?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:53}); // “He never takes off his lab coat
even in this heat.
I guess that's the mark of an intellectual.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:86}); // “The sea breeze, sun and Meteor.
Isn't nature strange?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:78}); // “The sea, the wind and the sun.
Don't you just love the outdoors?
It always puts me back on track.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:61}); // “Hey!
President Rufus came here yesterday.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:62}); // “He used to be the President's little boy.
We nicknamed him the little Prez!”{PAUSE}“He didn't look much different
than the surfers on the beach.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:54}); // “I'll interpret Professor Hojo's whispers.”{PAUSE}“Head west, past Mt. Corel and keep going…”{PAUSE}“Did you get that?
I didn't understand it well, myself.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:87}); // “I don't care even if it is the end of the world,
I just want to sit here and drink cocktails!”{PAUSE}“Ooooh…I think I drank too much.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:81}); // “Hey, loosen up a bit.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:57}); // “I'm getting a little sad.”{PAUSE}“Professor Hojo looks happy like a child
when he discovers something.
He gets this big smile and then laughs…”{PAUSE}“I guess we should chase after him.
A vacation for two
from Mt. Corel to Gold Saucer.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:56}); // “Yes, Professor Hojo.
Where?”{PAUSE}“It looks like the Professor discovered
or found a solution to something.”{PAUSE}“You know, I wonder…
if they headed west for Mt. Corel?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:55}); // “I'd be happy to be a guinea pig,
if it's for Professor Hojo!”

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:84}); // “Sitting around waiting for Meteor to come……
Why's it gotta fall on us?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:76}); // “Always the same story…
Women never pay any attention to me…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:71}); // “Hey…
heh heh…don't forget to talk to me, too.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:73}); // “If you're headed for Mt. Corel,
then you'd better buy
some "Soft".”{PAUSE}“At least that's what they always say,
don't they?”{PAUSE}“Be prepared, and you'll never fear.”{PAUSE}“Hey, I'm no idiot. I NEVER count my chickens
before they hatch! Not bad, huh?”

dialogStrings: Costa del Sol

{Aeris}
“Oh!
{Cloud}!!”

{Tifa}
“Look, look at that!”

{Cloud}
“Hm?”
{CHOICE}Who, Hojo?
{CHOICE}That girl in the bikini?

{Cloud}
“Is that man over there, Hojo?”

{Tifa}
“Go over and talk to him.”

{Cloud}
“Not a bad view…”

{Tifa}
“What're you looking at?”{PAUSE}“That man over there. That's Hojo from Shinra.
Get outta here
Go talk to him!”

“God!!
What do you want?”
{CHOICE}I want to talk with him
{CHOICE}Is that Hojo?

“(Hey, who do you think you are?)”{PAUSE}“Professor Hojo.
That scary man says
he wants to talk with you.”

“(What's his problem?)”{PAUSE}“Yes, that's right.
It's the Professor!”

“Professor…
someone's here to see you, sir.”

{Aeris}
“I have a bad feeling about this.”

Hojo
“I'm busy right now.”

“…But,
Too bad.”

Hojo
“No,
I remember you all now…”

“Heh heh heh…
All right. You sure are loud.”{PAUSE}“Long time no see, {Cloud}.”

Hojo
“Yes, yes. I remember now.”{PAUSE}“It's been a long time, {Cloud}.”

{Cloud}
“Hojo…”

Hojo
“Sometimes you just gotta do
something like this.”

{Cloud}
“What are you doing?”

Hojo
“It should be obvious,
I'm getting a tan.”

{Cloud}
“Answer me!”

Hojo
“Hmm!
I believe we're both after the same goal.”

{Cloud}
“You mean Sephiroth?”

Hojo
“Did you see him?”

Hojo
“I see…Ha! Ha!”

{Cloud}
“What is it?”

Hojo
“Nothing. I just remembered
a certain hypothesis…”{PAUSE}“Haven't you ever had the feeling
something is calling you?”{PAUSE}“Or that you had to visit
some place?”

{Cloud}
“I'll go anywhere Sephiroth is at!”{PAUSE}“To beat him and put an end to all this!”

Hojo
“I see…
This could be interesting.”{PAUSE}“Were you in SOLDIER? Heh heh heh!
Would you like to be my guinea pig?”

Hojo
“Oh, now what?
Are you going to draw your sword?”

{Aeris}
“{Cloud}, don't.
If he dies, we won't find out anything!”

{Tifa}
“Stop, {Cloud}!
I know how you feel, but you mustn't.”

{Barret}
“Yo, yo!
It's a bad idea to kill him.”

{Red XIII}
“…huff…puff…
Stop, {Cloud}!”

{Yuffie}
“Knock it off, {Cloud}!
Look I don't know,
but he knows a lot of stuff, right?”

Hojo
“Ha! Ha! Ha!…”

Hojo
“Say,
aren't you the 'Ancient'? ”

{Aeris}
“I'm {Aeris}.
The least you can do is
remember my name.”

{Aeris}
“I want you to tell me something,
Professor Hojo…”

{Aeris}
“I know I'm an Ancient.
My mother told me.”

Hojo
“Your mother?
Oh, you mean Ifalna.
How is she?”

{Aeris}
“You didn't know!?
She died.”

Hojo
“…I see.”

{Aeris}
“Professor Hojo?”{PAUSE}“Is Jenova an Ancient?
Is Sephiroth an Ancient?
Do we all have the same blood?”

Hojo
“…”

Hojo
“…mumble…mumble…head west…”

{Aeris}
“He's mumbling slowly…
That must mean he's hiding something!”

{Tifa}
“Hey!
Answer us!!”

{Red XIII}
“Grrr, Grrr…
…huff…puff…”

{Cloud}
“It's no use.
It's no go.”

“Professor Hojo is so sweet.
He's going to experiment on me.”

“He never takes off his lab coat
even in this heat.
I guess that's the mark of an intellectual.”

“I'll interpret Professor Hojo's whispers.”{PAUSE}“Head west, past Mt. Corel and keep going…”{PAUSE}“Did you get that?
I didn't understand it well, myself.”

“I'd be happy to be a guinea pig,
if it's for Professor Hojo!”

“Yes, Professor Hojo.
Where?”{PAUSE}“It looks like the Professor discovered
or found a solution to something.”{PAUSE}“You know, I wonder…
if they headed west for Mt. Corel?”

“I'm getting a little sad.”{PAUSE}“Professor Hojo looks happy like a child
when he discovers something.
He gets this big smile and then laughs…”{PAUSE}“I guess we should chase after him.
A vacation for two
from Mt. Corel to Gold Saucer.”

“That's right!!
It totally skipped my mind!”{PAUSE}“There was something
I was supposed to tell you.”

“That's right!
It's about that!”

“It was yesterday.
A man wearing a black cape
came up from the ocean.”{PAUSE}“I think he had tickets for the Gold Saucer…
no, that wasn't it…
I wonder if it was all just an illusion?”

“Hey!
President Rufus came here yesterday.”

“He used to be the President's little boy.
We nicknamed him the little Prez!”{PAUSE}“He didn't look much different
than the surfers on the beach.”

“heh heh…
All the good ones are gone.”

“What about that one?
Shall we make do with her?”
“But she's got a guy with her.”

“No problem,
I can handle him.”
“Right? You thought so, too?”
“Geez! What about those two?”
“Heh heh…I want the one on the left.”

“Well then,
I guess that leaves me
with the one on the right.”

“Hey…
heh heh…don't forget to talk to me, too.”

“Yipes!!
Help!!”{PAUSE}“…breath…breath!
Kind of takes your breath away, don't it!?”

“If you're headed for Mt. Corel,
then you'd better buy
some "Soft".”{PAUSE}“At least that's what they always say,
don't they?”{PAUSE}“Be prepared, and you'll never fear.”{PAUSE}“Hey, I'm no idiot. I NEVER count my chickens
before they hatch! Not bad, huh?”

“Hmm. Man, I'm draggin' today.
It's all Shinra's fault.”{PAUSE}“I really hate Shinra, Inc.!
They're all crooked, those Shinra.”{PAUSE}“Hmm…
What a bitter guy
Chill out a bit.”

“Eeeew!!
Leave me alone!”{PAUSE}“Ublk! …glug…glug…
You're gonna make
me drown!”

“Always the same story…
Women never pay any attention to me…”

“If this is your idea of flirting…forget it.
I do fine as it is.”

“The sea, the wind and the sun.
Don't you just love the outdoors?
It always puts me back on track.”

“Hey, good timing.
Would you mind putting lotion on me?”
{CHOICE}With pleasure
{CHOICE}Sorry
“Uhhhnn…”{PAUSE}“Than--kyu!”
“Hey, loosen up a bit.”

“Eaaggh!!
Leave me alone!”{PAUSE}“I'm trying to learn how to swim
before the end of the world.”

“Eaaggh!!
Leave me alone!”{PAUSE}“I'm trying to learn how to swim
before the end of the world.”

“Sitting around waiting for Meteor to come……
Why's it gotta fall on us?”

“It's getting closer and closer.
Someone will do something, don't you think?”

“The sea breeze, sun and Meteor.
Isn't nature strange?”

“I don't care even if it is the end of the world,
I just want to sit here and drink cocktails!”{PAUSE}“Ooooh…I think I drank too much.”
